summary: Manages a shared collection of buffers and tracers that underpin sparse and dense array representations used during JAX program (jaxpr) evaluation. Provides helper methods to push new buffers and retrieve data, dense values, index arrays, and pointer structures for sparse tensors.
business_intent: Enable efficient sparse tensor computation within JAX by centralizing storage and access to underlying data structures, allowing multiple sparse value objects to reference common buffers during program execution.
